goal.ch: This course is designed to give students a variety of modern macroeconomic theories which help students to hold the current macroeconomic issues and train students’ thinking and logic ability. The course concentrates on short-run fluctuations with an emphasis on the roles of fiscal policy and monetary policy. It then turns to the models of economic growth in the long-run.
